alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 12:50PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central White Pine County through 115 PM PDT... At 1250 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles south of Schellbourne to 15 miles northeast of McGill to 25 miles southwest of Partoun. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of east central White Pine County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
